You people think way too hard about this. NTR is just shit where the reader is intended to feel bad. You're intended to self insert into the loser. This isn't intended to make the reader feel bad, absolutely some people could but it's not the goal here.

(read other message first) you don't understand the perspective we're supposed to be relating to. 'cheating' is from the cheater's perspective, we see them do this taboo thing and we find enjoyment out of it, while 'netorare' takes the perspective of the person who gets cheated on, and you can feel bad for them and still just look at it as a taboo thing, you can relate to them (if you have a cuckhold fetish or something similar), you can find joy from their pain. there's plenty of cheating hentai where the person doing the cheating is the girl and its the same situation, we enjoy the hentai and forget about the feelings of the guy who got cucked (an example off the top of my head is baka dakedo where the girl is cheating). my point is, if you're bitching you a dumb shit and you ain't got NO MAIDENS

cringe ass comments under this post, let me explain what the difference between cheating and netorare is for the hundredth time. yes, both of these types of hentai involve cheating, but one type is given the 'cheating' tag and the other gets the 'netorare' tag. 

cheating just means one or more of the people involved is in a relation and is betraying their partner to have sex. sometimes the partner is close by and there's that 'will they/won't they get caught' action, but it always results in them not getting caught.

 netorare is the other side of the coin where the person being cheated on finds out and has a breakdown. its common for the person who does the cheating to have been coerced or forced into cheating, and then this often ties into the 'mind break' tag where the person that does the cheating has sex that's soOoOooO good they become the slave of the other cheater or something similar. 

the random ass sexism you're claiming is because (see above comment)
